name: KFirebaseMessaging
summary: KFirebaseMessaging: A Kotlin Multiplatform library that simplifies the integration of Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM) into your apps, enabling push notifications across Android and iOS platforms with minimal setup.
description: KFirebaseMessaging is a robust Kotlin Multiplatform library designed to facilitate the seamless integration of Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM) in your applications. By leveraging Kotlin's shared code capabilities, this library allows developers to implement push notifications effortlessly across both Android and iOS platforms, including Objective-C interoperability.`
